Text.Page:
A decurion's gotta do what a decurion's gotta do. You're no decurion, but you can certainly help.

The {@LinkCreature:30#520#dreadpaw mandrills} have run wild. In addition to attacking peaceful archaeologists, they're committing an unforgivable crime. They're moving the stones around!

Enough violence to scare them off, and we'll keep the {@Rgn:30008$$Lower Archive} from looking like the ruins of the {@Rgn:30009$$Upper Archive}!

The only good mandrill is a dead mandrill.

I'm a good judge of character, and I can tell by the look in your eye that the {@LinkCreature:30#520#dreadpaw mandrills} are a thing of the past.
